EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your equipped rune arm grants you +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Infused Weapons I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your equipped weapon in your main hand gains +1 to its Enhancement bonus. Additionally, you gain +1 bonus to your attack roll to confirm a critical hit, and a +1 bonus to the damage of your critical hits (before multipliers).
Your equipped rune arm gains +1 stable charge tier. In addition, it grants you an additional +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 2, for a total of +16.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Infused Armor I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your equipped armor gains +1 to its Enhancement bonus. Additionally, your equipped armor or docent grants you +5 Physical Resistance Rating and -10% Arcane Spell Failure. (Artificer Infusions are not affected by Arcane Spell Failure, but this assists with scroll use.)
Your equipped rune arm grants you an additional +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 3, for a total of +24.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Infused Weapons II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain a +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with Crossbows, Bastard Swords, Dwarven Axes, Light Hammers, Warhammers, and Morningstars.
Your equipped weapon in your main hand gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus, for a total of +2. You also gain an additional +1 bonus to your attack roll to confirm a critical hit, and a +1 bonus to the damage of your critical hits (before multipliers), for a total of +2.
Your equipped rune arm gains +1 stable charge tier. In addition, it grants you an additional +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 4, for a total of +32.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Infused Armor II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your equipped armor gains an additional +1 to its Enhancement bonus, for a total of +2. Your equipped armor or docent also grants you an additional +5 Physical Resistance Rating for a total of +10 and an additional -10% Arcane Spell Failure for a total of -20%. (Artificer Infusions are not affected by ASF, but this assists with scroll use.) You gain an additional +15 Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating innately, regardless of your Armor.
Your equipped rune arm grants you an additional +8 Universal Spell Power when it is charged to Charge Tier 5, for a total of +40.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Master Engineer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +4 Intelligence. The Enhancement bonus of your armor and your equipped weapon in your main hand are each increased by an additional +1, for a total of +3. Your equipped weapon in your main hand is now a Spellcasting Implement, providing a +3 Implement bonus to Universal Spell Power for every +1 Enhancement bonus on the weapon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Crossbows, Hammers and Morningstars, or Hand and a Half Weapons. Gain bonuses to Attack and Damage Rolls with the selected weapon types.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crossbow Training I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with all crossbows. +1 to damage with all repeating crossbows, +2 to damage rolls with non-repeating crossbows when not dual shooting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hammer and Morningstar Training I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand and a Half Training I
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Waraxes. +5% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Field Engineer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration, Disable Device and Open Locks. Rank 3: +1 to Reflex Saves vs. Traps.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Field Scrapper
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to your Sunder DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Thaumaturgical Conduits
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have made slight improvements to the efficiency of your rune arms. Your rune arms build charge [10/20/33]% faster.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Item Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have a [25/50/75]% chance to negate potential item wear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Crossbows, Hammers and Morningstars, or Hand and a Half Weapons. Gain bonuses to Attack and Damage Rolls with the selected weapon types.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crossbow Training II
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with all crossbows. +1 to damage rolls with all repeating crossbows, +2 to damage rolls with non-repeating crossbows when not dual shooting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hammer and Morningstar Training
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack damage rolls with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand and a Half Training II
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Waraxes. +5% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Wrack Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Melee or Ranged Attack: On Damage: Deals extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct's fortification is reduced and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times. (Cooldown: [12/8/4] seconds):

EnhancementSelection.Name: Melee Wrack Construct
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +10% Damage Melee Attack: On Damage: Deals [3/6/9]d6 extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct's fortification is reduced and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times.
Damage scales with 200% Melee Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ranged Wrack Construct
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +10% Damage Ranged Attack: On Damage: Deals [3/6/9]d6 extra damage to constructs and living constructs, and applies Wracked: This construct or living construct's fortification is reduced and loses its inherent immunity to sneak attack. This effect stacks up to five times.
Damage scales with 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Caustic Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Perform either a melee or ranged attack that does extra acid and rust damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Caustic Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +10% Damage Cooldown: 6 seconds Ranged Crossbow Attack: On Damage deals 3d6 extra Acid damage and 6d6 extra Rust damage.
Damage scales with 200% Ranged Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Caustic Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +10% Damage Cooldown: 6 seconds Melee Attack: On Damage deals 3d6 extra Acid damage and 6d6 extra Rust damage.
Damage scales with 200% Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Extra Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use each of your action boosts [1/2/3] additional times per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Action Boost Selector
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Action Boost: Attack and Action Boost: Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Boost: Power
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Melee and Ranged power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Boost: Attack
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to gain a +[4/6/8] Action Boost bonus to your attack rolls for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Crossbows, Hammers and Morningstars, or Hand and a Half Weapons. Gain bonuses to Attack and Damage Rolls with the selected weapon types.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crossbow Training III
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with all crossbows. +1 to damage with all non-repeating crossbows when non dual shooting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hammer and Morningstar Training III
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand and a Half Training III
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Waraxes. +5% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Disable Construct
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate: Target construct or living construct is dazed for [10/20/30] seconds. This effect is removed on damage. Using this ability on a target already affected by it will extend the duration. Cooldown: 25 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Shatter Defenses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a Melee or Ranged attack that also applies a Trauma effect.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shatter Defenses (Crossbow)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +10% Damage Cooldown: 10 seconds Tactical Ranges Crossbow Attack: On Hit: Reduce the target's Armor Class by 5 and lowers fortification by 10%. A successful fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder Bonuses). Regardless of saving throw result target will suffer the Trauma effect, -3 penalty to Fortitude saves due to shock, stacks 5 times. Lasts 24 seconds. This ability shares a cooldown with sunder.

DC.Name: Battle Engineer: Shatter Defenses (Crossbow)
DC.Description: Tactical Ranges Crossbow Attack: On Hit: Reduce the target's Armor Class by 5 and lowers fortification by 10%. A successful fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder Bonuses). Regardless of saving throw result target will suffer the Trauma effect, -3 penalty to Fortitude saves due to shock, stacks 5 times. Lasts 24 seconds. This ability shares a cooldown with sunder.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shatter Defenses (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +10% Damage Cooldown: 10 seconds Tactical Melee Attack: On Hit: Reduce the target's Armor Class by 5 and lowers fortification by 10%. A successful fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder Bonuses). Regardless of saving throw result target will suffer the Trauma effect, -3 penalty to Fortitude saves due to shock, stack 5 times. Lasts 24 seconds. This ability shares a cooldown with sunder.

DC.Name: Battle Engineer: Shatter Defenses (Melee)
DC.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: On Hit: Reduce the target's Armor Class by 5 and lowers fortification by 10%. A successful fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder Bonuses). Regardless of saving throw result target will suffer the Trauma effect, -3 penalty to Fortitude saves due to shock, stack 5 times. Lasts 24 seconds. This ability shares a cooldown with sunder.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Thundershock Imbue
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your weapons hum with Electricity, dealing an extra 1d6 Electric damage on each hit, scaling with Electric Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Battle Engineer: Imbue
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your weapons hum with Electricity, dealing an extra 1d6 Electric damage on each hit, scaling with Electric Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of Strength, Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Crossbows, Hammers and Morningstars, or Hand and a Half Weapons. Gain bonuses to Attack and Damage Rolls with the selected weapon types.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crossbow Training IV
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack rolls with all crossbows. +1 to damage rolls with all repeating crossbows, +2 to damage rolls with non-repeating crossbows when not dual shooting.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hammer and Morningstar Training IV
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand and a Half Training IV
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to attack and damage rolls with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Waraxes. +5% Strikethrough

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Battle Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Action Boost: Haste or Endless Fusilade.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Endless Fusilade
EnhancementSelection.Description: Action Boost: You may activate this ability to enchant your Crossbow to instantly reload itself for 18 seconds. You must have a Crossbow equipped to activate this skill. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Haste Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate this ability to receive a 30% Action Boost attack speed bonus for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Agility Engine
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wearing a Rune Arm, you gain +[3/6/10]% Doublestrike and Doubleshot and +[1/2/3] bonus Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one of Strength, Dexterity or Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Reconstructed Armaments
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain Critical Threat Range with your chosen set of weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reconstructed Crossbows
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with crossbows.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reconstructed Arms
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with Light Hammers, Warhammers and Morningstars.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reconstructed Edges
EnhancementSelection.Description:
+1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with Bastard Swords and Dwarven Axes.
You gain a +20% Competence bonus to Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Weapon Attachment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to attach your currently equipped weapons to yourself, giving you superior control over them. Until you unequip these items or rest, they deal +0.5[W] damage. Cooldown: 15 seconds Note: Selecting this locks out Warforged/Bladeforged Weapon Attachment.

Stance.Name: Weapon Attachment
Stance.Description: You current weapon is attached to you giving better control. You deal +0.5[W] damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Thunder Shock Weapon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between a Melee or Ranged attack that also deals additional electric damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thunder-Shock Weapon (Crossbow)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +30% Damage Cooldown: 12 seconds Tactical Ranged Crossbow Attack: On Damage: Deals 6d6 extra Electric damage that scales with 200% Ranged Power, and Trips the target. A successful Strength check negates the Trip effect. (DC 14 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder bonuses)

DC.Name: Battle Engineer: Thunder-Shock Weapon (Crossbow)
DC.Description: Tactical Ranged Crossbow Attack: On Damage: Deals 6d6 extra Electric damage that scales with 200% Ranged Power, and Trips the target. A successful Strength check negates the Trip effect.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thunder-Shock Weapon (Melee)
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +30% Damage Cooldown: 12 seconds Tactical Melee Attack: On Damage: Deals 6d6 extra Electric damage that scales with 200% Melee Power, and Trips the target. A successful Strength check negates the Trip effect. (DC 14 + 1/2 Artificer Level + INT mod + Sunder bonuses)

DC.Name: Battle Engineer: Thunder-Shock Weapon (Melee)
DC.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: On Damage: Deals 6d6 extra Electric damage that scales with 200% Melee Power, and Trips the target. A successful Strength check negates the Trip effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Unlock Potential
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wearing a Rune Arm, you gain +20 Melee and Ranged Power and +1 Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Battle Engineer: Tactical Mobility
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a 10% Action Boost bonus to Movement Speed while wearing a Rune Arm.
